function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population densities in urban areas","Impact":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control population density, promoting remote work, improving ventilation systems","Technologies":"Remote work platforms, ventilation and air filtration systems","People":"Urban residents, commuters, public transport users","Owner":"City councils, urban planners, employers"},{"Description":"Increased interaction between people due to urban design","Impact":"Facilitates the spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Reconfigure urban design to promote social distancing, improve ventilation in indoor spaces","Technologies":"Urban design modeling software, ventilation and air purification systems","People":"Urban residents, visitors, workers","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, city councils"},{"Description":"High-risk environment in public transport","Impact":"Facilitates the spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Improved sanitation measures, reduced occupancy, ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Sanitation stations, occupancy monitoring systems, ventilation and air purification systems","People":"Public transport users, commuters","Owner":"Transport authorities, public transport operators, city councils"}]}
